Fasterize

Source: R/misc_terra.R
terra_fasterize.Rd

This function converts a sf::st_as_sf() object to a terra::rast() object using fasterize::fasterize(). It is similar to terra::rasterize(), except that it has greater performance.

terra_fasterize(sf, raster, ...)

Arguments

sf

sf::st_sf() Object.
raster

terra::rast() Object.
...

Additional arguments passed to fasterize::fasterize().

Value

A terra::rast() object.

Examples

# \dontrun{
# load data
nc <- read_sf(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package = "sf"))
nc <- st_transform(nc, st_crs("ESRI:54017"))
r <- get_world_berhman_1km_rast()

# convert to raster
nc_rast <- terra_fasterize(nc, r)

# plot result
plot(nc_rast)

# }
